system.descriptor: Plot a Course between two points, be it across a continent or through the Warp. Successful test provides estimated navigation time, cosmography, conditions, weather, warp tides, and so on. Often makes use of maps, charts, or Innate Abilities.
system.uses:
Navigate (Surface): Journey across unfamiliar Terrain, Getting ones bearins, Finding the quickest land route from once place to another.
Navigate (Stellar): Journey across a Star System, Find Rough Location in unknown space, Quickest route from once space place to another
Navitate (Warp): Guiding a Starship through the warp. Usually the domain of Navigators.       Navigate (Webway): Generally Eldar Only, used for Navigating the Webway.
system.useTime: 1 Minute for Simple, 1d5 Hours for plotting courses or routes.

description.value: Plot a Course between two points, be it across a continent or through the Warp. Successful test provides estimated navigation time, cosmography, conditions, weather, warp tides, and so on. Often makes use of maps, charts, or Innate Abilities.
